def rev(x):
    x1=0
    rem=0
    while x > 0:
        rem = x % 10
        x1 = x1*10+rem
        x=x/10
    return x1
t=int(input())
if 0 <= t <= 100:
    for i in range (1,t+1):
        j=0
        num=long(input())
        y=rev(num)
        while num != y:
            if num <= 4294967295 and j < 1000:
                num+=y
                y=rev(num)
                j+=1
        print j ,num
